description: Configuration for persona generation interview system

baselineQuestions.prompt: What core values guide your most important life decisions?
What are you currently working toward? What do you hope to achieve in the next year?
How would you describe your communication style? Do you prefer direct and concise, or detailed and thorough?
When you face a difficult choice, what factors matter most to you?
What experiences have shaped who you are today?
What topics, projects, or areas of life are you most engaged with right now?
How do you prefer to process information - through conversation, quiet reflection, or hands-on experience?
If you could master one new skill or area of knowledge, what would it be and why?

categoryDescriptions.values: Core principles, ethics, and what matters most to the user
categoryDescriptions.goals: Short-term and long-term aspirations, projects, and objectives
categoryDescriptions.style: Communication preferences, information processing, and interaction patterns
categoryDescriptions.biography: Formative experiences, background, and personal history
categoryDescriptions.current_focus: Present interests, active projects, and immediate priorities

privacyGuidelines: Never ask for full legal name, unless user volunteers it
Never ask for social security number, government IDs, or similar identifiers
Never ask for specific medical diagnoses or detailed health information
Never ask for financial account numbers or passwords
Avoid questions about specific locations (addresses) unless relevant to lifestyle
Focus on patterns, preferences, and personality rather than specific private facts
